title: Salary Calculator
subtitle: Quick and easy overtime calculation tool

baseSalary.label: Base Salary
baseSalary.tooltip: Employee's monthly gross salary. Cannot be lower than minimum wage.

dailyWorkHours.label: Daily Working Hours
dailyWorkHours.tooltip: Daily normal working hours. Default value is 9 hours.

totalWorkHours.label: Total Working Hours
totalWorkHours.tooltip: Total hours worked in the month. Normal overtime rate is x1.5, holiday overtime rate is x2.0.

holidayWork.label: Holiday Work
holidayWork.tooltip: Work performed on official holidays is calculated at x2.0 rate.

hours.label: Holiday Overtime Hours
hours.tooltip: Total hours worked on official holidays. Calculated separately at x2.0 rate from normal overtime.
